name: SSRC
description:
SunSetRefugeeCamp

Post-Apoclyptic  visual novel demo 

where you play as a girl trying to unravel the mystery of her father disappearance

and she meets a team of special people who help her through the way

[Demo for otome Game / turnbased visual novel] hopefully
